text: 16:33 Jon 14:27; Rom 5:1; 8:37; Efesus 2:14; 2 Timoti 3:12; 1 Jon 4:4; 5:4Ia nan poroghɨv ikɨva egh ia navir amɨrizim ikiasa kɨ ifonge. Kamaghsua kɨ akar kam ia mɨkeme. Eghtɨ ia nguazir kamɨn ikɨtɨ, osɨmtɨziba ia bativam. Eghtɨ ian naviba gavgavigh ikɨ! Kɨ nguazir kamɨn gavgavim dɨkabɨragha anegɨfa!”
